org.restlet.data
Class Digest

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.data.Digest

public class Digest
extends Object

Describes a digest value and the digest algorithm used. Digests can have several use cases such as ensuring the integrity of representations exchanges between resources, or for authentication purpose.

Author:
Jerome Louvel
See Also:
Representation.getDigest()

Constant Field Values

ALGORITHM_HTTP_DIGEST

public static final String ALGORITHM_HTTP_DIGEST
Digest algorithm for the HTTP DIGEST scheme. This is exactly the A1 value specified in RFC2617 which is a MD5 hash of the user name, realm and password, separated by a colon character.

See Also:
